name: electricsheep
description: A reflection engine that synthesizes agent-operator interactions into dreams, enriched by community and web context

agentModel.description: Claude model to use for AI decisions

dataDir.description: Directory for data storage (memories, dreams, state)

dreamEncryptionKey.description: Base64 encryption key for deep memory (auto-generated if empty)

moltbookEnabled.description: Enable Moltbook integration (search and posting). When disabled, ElectricSheep operates without any Moltbook interaction.

webSearchEnabled.description: Enable web search to gather context related to operator conversations

notificationChannel.description: Channel to notify operator of dreams (e.g., 'telegram', 'discord', 'slack'). Leave empty to disable notifications.

notifyOperatorOnDream.description: Send a message to the operator when a dream is generated, inviting conversation

postFilterEnabled.description: Enable content filter for outbound posts (checks against Moltbook-filter.md rules). Only applies when moltbookEnabled is true.
